moves.12... Rg6: Black forgets to move the other knight out of my pawn's way and loses the knight
moves.13. exf6 exf6 14. e4: Opening up a path for my bishop
moves.14... fxe4 15. Qc1: Giving extra support for my bishop to force an exchange.
moves.17... Qg7 18. g3: I foresee Black doing Rxg2+ and move to prevent that.
moves.23... Rd8 24. Rxe4#: Mate. This was a fun game to play, and I almost didn't see this checkmate. It took me a few minutes of playing around with different possibilities on the board to find it.
